message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $12000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $15000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! However, I still think $13000 is a bit low for me. I'll try to meet you in the middle again, so I'll counteroffer at $14500. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! However, I still think $13500 is a bit low for me. I'll try to meet you in the middle again, so I'll counteroffer at $14000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13750. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm almost there, Bob! However, I still think $13750 is a bit low for me. I'll try to meet you in the middle again, so I'll counteroffer at $14250. What do you think?
